Blog.post: AH!!!! tis is my 3rd time writin my 2nd blog le!!!! got lotz of problem wif tis new ting dat i juz learnt yesterday... ok i admit la... i realli suk!!!! haiz... my blog sure suk la mad man.. i realli envy all my other frens... dey got a juch better blog den i do... dey r able 2 post nice pictures... show their list of frens.. post their mood n bla bla... lotz of tings man.. compared 2 tis borin blog of mine... ah!!! im dam disappointed abt myself...!!!! their blog r 1000000 times better den mine.... sumtimes i realli wonder.. r dere anybodi outside hu realli reads my blog..? haiz... dey shld be bored aledi... i nv get bored readin my frens blog... dey r so... nice... i hope 2 learn mor man.... welll..... at least tis is my 2nd blog liaoz... so shld hav gained abit of experienced... hee hee.... ;)... hope i will get better n better...! aniwae... today i woke up in a veri bad mood..... cos i didnt get a gd nite sleep!!! all thnx 2 de bloody mosquitoes... sting mi lik mad... now.. my legs r swollen n itchy!!! ah!!! its killin me! as im ritin these blog.. im scratchin my dam leg lik mad... even got blood liaoz... Better not let mi see de same fuckin mosquitoes... so dam bloody irritating... bunch of flyin chee byes!!! i hate mosquitoes lik mad!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! oops.. sorry.. abit tooo vulgar... i will use sum subtitutes nxt time.. lik &*(^%*^#^% #@$#@!%$#&*(2213!$#%6^8(W... hahaz.... im dam lame... currently.. im feelin dam bored... got notin 2 do... haiz... *sighxxx* Danieldaniel

wao.. a first blog i hav now... tis is actualli 1 of de 1st time i post a diary online.... dun realli noe wad 2 rite as tis is my first time writin tis sort of tings.. it is quite cool 2 actualli let other ppl all around de world 2 noe how u fell n tings lik dat. ;) hmm em... letz c wad happened today... well.. still not 2 bad... had 2 woke up at 8 so dat i can reach 2 sch in time 4 choir... ( my cca )... den after dat... had my breakfast which was a char siew bao... de bad ting was as i was on my way walkin 2 de bus stop.. it started rainin... wa.. den i chiong lik siao man... i almost fell dwn summor... of course in de end i reach sch in time 4 choir.... den... i had 2 get de choir rm keys.... frm de office... i had a hard time man.. i didnt noe wad 2 say 2 de guy at de counter... in de end i still got my keys... wif sum stooopid ways... :(./...de bad ting now is dat i am at home now... wif de keys!! i actualli 4gotten 2 return de keys... den my teacher called mi n gave mi a lecture.. wad a bad dayyy,..... =s..... haiz.. i noe i hav been riting lotz of crap.. i realli hav not much of an idea wad 2 rite.... well.. letz hope de next few blogs i rite.. dey will get better n better.... gd bye!!! DanielDaniel
